line_1: When from thy frantic look our glance recedes?
line_2: By mournful love, that eye of softness pleads?

line_1: From whence the shrinking eye recedes,
line_2: Where high the dangerous pathway leads

line_1: Urg'd by the golden morn, the night recedes,
line_2: And year to year in changeful course succeeds;
Whose soul with keener anguish bleeds,
Life's purple Current o'er the Body spreads,
